item.description:
Cities and towns throughout greater Boston (Boston, Cambridge, Sommerville, Watertown, etc.) are holding local elections (city councilors, school committee, alderman, etc.) this coming Tuesday November 6. Polls open at 7am and close at 8pm.

Introduce Ron Paul to local VOTERS on election day at a polling location close to where you live.

Stand out with your sign(s) and distribute literature or prominently post a Ron Paul sign (or several) near a polling site. Get there early (better yet the night before) to get a good spot for sign posting!

(Thanks go to Bill Behan of Dorchester for promoting this event!)
item.name: Greater Boston Town and City Elections - Ron Paul Sign Display
